org.jgentleframework.context.aop
Interface ClassFilter

All Superinterfaces:
Filter<ClassMatching>
All Known Implementing Classes:
AbstractDefinitionMatcherPointcut.DefinitionMatcherClassFilter, AbstractDefinitionMatcherPointcut.DefinitionMatcherClassFilterClass
public interface ClassFilter
extends Filter<ClassMatching>

Filter that restricts matching of a pointcut or introduction to a given set of target classes.

Author:
LE QUOC CHUNG - mailto: skydunkpro@yahoo.com
